Before, Sora discovered he had a foot fetish, there was Ventus. Ven was very much like Sora, he was a young keyblade wielder who loved his friends. Not only that, but he had a huge foot fetish. Now with that in mind, he must journey out to the unknown worlds to discover what it mens to worship a girl's feet.

1. NO GUY FEET!!!

3. Try to keep it about feet, although a few sexual things here and there are ok.

6. Do not wander away from a plot already established. (For ex. We set it up that Ven wants to suck Aqua's toes in his room, don't say in the next chapter that they go to Aqua's house.) Any chapters like this will be subject to change by me.
